Class Payment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Payment

  • public class Payment
extends java.lang.Object
    Class created to represent a receipt for tax payment on a property Author: Jonathan Falvey

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Payment()
      Default no-arg constructor
      Payment(PropertyOwner owner, Property property, int year, double amountPaid, double taxRemaining)
      Constructor used to crate new payments

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String ownerFormat()
      Presents key information about the payment for property owners
      java.lang.String propertyFormat()
      Presents key information about the payment for properties
      java.lang.String writeFormat()
      summaries information about the payment for writing to a csv file

    • Constructor Detail

      • Payment

        public Payment()
        Default no-arg constructor

      • Payment

        public Payment(PropertyOwner owner,
               Property property,
               int year,
               double amountPaid,
               double taxRemaining)
        Constructor used to crate new payments
        Parameters:
        owner - the owner who has paid tax
        property - the property tax has been paid on
        year - the year this payment was made
        amountPaid - amount of tax that was paid
        taxRemaining - how much tax the owner must still pay

    • Method Detail

        Presents key information about the payment for property owners
